select sku.id as sku_id, sku.*, goods.id as goods_id, goods.* from basic_sku sku inner join basic_goods goods on sku.goods_id=goods.id where sku.id in
#{id}
select sku.id as sku_id, sku.*, goods.id as goods_id, goods.* from basic_sku sku inner join basic_goods goods on sku.goods_id=goods.id where sku.id = #{id}

select sku.id as sku_id, sku.*, goods.id as goods_id, goods.* from basic_sku sku inner join basic_goods goods on sku.goods_id=goods.id inner join basic_category category on goods.goods_category=category.id
and goods.goods_name like concat('%', #{bo.goodsName}, '%')
and goods.goods_code like concat('%', #{bo.goodsCode}, '%')
and goods.goods_brand=#{bo.goodsBrand}
and sku.sku_name like concat('%', #{bo.skuName}, '%')
and sku.barcode like concat('%', #{bo.barcode}, '%')
and (category.id=#{bo.goodsCategory} or category.parent_id=#{bo.goodsCategory})
order by sku.goods_id desc
